name: Four Side Chairs (chaises à la reine)
maker: Jacques Gondoin, François-Toussaint Foliot, probably carved by Toussaint Foliot
description: Four Side Chairs (chaises à la reine); Jacques Gondoin (French, 1737 - 1818), François-Toussaint Foliot (French, 1748 - about 1839, master 1773), probably carved by Toussaint Foliot (French, about 1715 - 1798, master 1732); Paris, France; 1780 - 1781; Gessoed and gilded beech; modern silk upholstery; 71.DA.93; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Four Side Chairs (chaises à la reine)
medium: Gessoed and gilded beech; modern silk upholstery
